channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: H&R Block Coupons and Deals: 15% Off Tax Prep in 2025
item.description: When you do your own taxes with the help of H&R Block software (or a human, if you need it), you can get 15% off.

item.description: Gaming startups, specifically those building casual mobile games, are very hot in Turkey right now, and today another one is announcing a sizable roun...

item.title: Adidas Promo Codes & Deals: 20% Off
item.description: Shop sale items at Adidas and get an additional 20% off when you use our coupon code.

item.title: The School Shootings Were Fake. The Terror Was Real

item.title: Sephora Promo Codes and Deals: 50% Off
item.description: Save 50% on your favorite (or soon-to-be favorite) skincare products when you shop daily deals at Sephora.

item.title: Apple might be working on a new ‘Invites’ app

item.title: xAI is testing a standalone iOS app for its Grok chatbot
item.description: Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, is testing out a standalone iOS app for its chatbot, Grok, which was available only to X users until now. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: The 31 Best Gadgets From CES 2025 You Can Buy Right Now
item.description: From smartphones to smart glasses, here’s everything announced at this year's big tech trade show that you can actually order—or preorder—today.
